title: NC's New 2025 Roof Underwriting Rules: What Homeowners Need to Know
summary: Major changes to North Carolina roof requirements for homeowners insurance. Learn about age limits, inspection requirements, and how to save on premiums with these new 2025 rules.

title: July 4th Insurance Safety Tips
summary: Protect your home and family during Independence Day celebrations with essential insurance tips for fireworks, BBQs, and holiday gatherings.

title: Understanding Auto Insurance Coverage Types
summary: A comprehensive guide to liability, collision, comprehensive, and uninsured motorist coverage. Learn what each type protects and how to choose the right coverage for your needs.

title: Creating a Home Inventory for Insurance Claims
summary: Learn how to document your belongings properly to ensure smooth insurance claims. Tips for photographing, organizing, and storing your home inventory safely.

title: Do You Need Flood Insurance? A Complete Guide
summary: Understand when standard homeowners insurance isn't enough. Learn about flood zones, NFIP coverage, and private flood insurance options to protect your property.

title: Term vs. Whole Life Insurance: Making the Right Choice
summary: Compare term and whole life insurance policies to determine which fits your family's needs and budget. Understand the benefits, costs, and long-term implications of each.

title: Preventing Winter Weather Insurance Claims
summary: Protect your home from ice dams, frozen pipes, and snow damage. Essential winterization tips that can save you thousands in insurance deductibles and premium increases.
